JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Experienced Operational Purchaser for Sourcing and Logistic Team
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
On behalf of Green Hydrogen Systems (GHS) we are looking for an Operational Purchaser with experience from serving internal customers from the intersection of R&D, Supply Chain and production to serve end customers

The role
As the Operational Purchaser you will be responsible for ensuring material availability for the GHS production and be the anchor point in managing the MRP demand and transfer them into purchase orders. Further you will maintain master data in the ERP system, maintain and develop our safety stock and monitor KPI’s and order follow-up for our production and service set-up.


In addition, this position plays an essential role in developing a scalable and resilient  purchasing flow in order to consolidate further the spend within the procurement organization. You are also expected to have a solid, professional knowledge and the ability to interact efficiently with your colleagues, including the full Supply Chain to secure a professional purchase and availability of production materials.

With your great experience and knowledge within logistics and purchasing you contribute by defining and documenting company processes.

You will also:

  • Handle the operational purchase of production materials
  • Contribute in planning of change orders, and ensure efficient implementation of these
  • Follow-up on material shortages in production to ensure timely deliveries
  • Handle Claims, service requests and return orders
  • Define and document own processes within the purchasing area
  • Update and maintain master data in materials master
  • Coordinate daily with planning and warehouse in material status matters
  • Assist the Strategic Purchaser in daily operations e.g. overdue, forwarding deliveries


Your profile
The right candidate has a strong passion for and the ability to participate in the further development of our supply chain organization and works independently in a responsible manner whilst being comfortable in an innovative and ambitious team. You are motivated in a dynamic and busy environment with a huge amount of simultaneous tasks. Moreover, your experience covers:

  • Hands-on purchase experience from a manufacturing company
  • ERP processes in SAP and a solid system and process understanding
  • A professional level of English both written and spoken since you will be part of an international environment

Your background could be within purchasing, logistics, shipping or similar in an operational role with many contact points.


Collaboration and development in focus
As an employee at GHS, you get a unique opportunity to make your mark on a company that is on a rising growth curve within one of the key technologies for optimal utilization of renewable energy. You will be one of the key players in an innovative company with a strong focus on development, innovation and cooperation.

The position is full-time with place of employment at GHS address in Kolding. GHS offer a salary that is in accordance with the nature of the position, requirements, and your background. Pension scheme and health insurance are also part of the salary package.

Application
We interview candidates on an on-going basis and would like to see you start as soon as possible. If you want to know more about the position, please contact Annette Engmose at Blachman Search +45 51 46 45 43 or by mail ae@blachman.dk.

 

About Green Hydrogen Systems A/S (GHS)
Green Hydrogen Systems A/S (GHS) is ready to take a position as one of the world’s leaders in developing and producing electrolysis plants that use electricity from renewable energy and water to produce green hydrogen. Hydrogen is a cornerstone in the transition from fossils fuels to a low-carbon economy, and green hydrogen will play a central role in decarbonizing both industrial processes and economic sectors. The global market for electrolysers is significant and is growing rapidly. We are in the process of commercialising our 2nd generation electrolysers, and the vision is that with modular solutions, we will help accelerate the market for hydrogen plants that can ensure optimal utilisation of renewable energy. With solid owners and close collaboration with major Danish and foreign partners in the energy market, the foundation is in place.
